explanation: [0-0] A man in a black shirt and black pants is standing by the road, holding a box in his hand. Next to him stands a man in a police uniform and a black hat, with his hands held in front of him. Both men are facing left. There is a circular pattern below them, and some trees and buildings in the distance. White text with a black background reads "GTA Logic."
[0-2] The man in black then lifts the box in his hand and throws it to the ground. The man in the police uniform raises his left hand and starts talking.
